name: Furnished 1Bedroom with Elevator close to MBTA
neighborhood_overview: Walking distance to public transportation, all green lines B, C and D line. Shops, grocery stores, restaurants are steps away. Easy access anywhere
description:
Located in a quiet and professional elevator building, this is a sunny and spacious fully furnished one-bedroom featuring hardwood floors, high ceilings and a common roof deck just one flight up. The renovated eat-in kitchen provides granite countertops, gas stove, dishwasher, fridge and a high top table complete with leather chairs. There are AC units in the bed and living areas, with laundry and storage on the first floor.

Other things to note
After your reservation has been confirmed, we will email you a contract for you to review and sign. The contract will just outline the basic house rules.
Pack n' Play/ High top chair available upon request for $10/night.
